item.title: Custom Mining Area
item.dc:creator: @hadlich4 hadlich4
item.description:
@hadlich4 wrote:

Cres:

the quarry at rimmington has these dirt blobs over them, idk if your client has them too. you could use those for details on the floor but idk how they work.

I’m sure it does I’ll check it out later right now I found out how to make shading work right but the issue now is the clipping is fucked up I’ll figure it out though but thanks for the reference

Read full topic

item.title: Custom Mining Area
item.dc:creator: @hadlich4 hadlich4
item.description:
@hadlich4 wrote:

Chassy13:

Neat. Since the area is on/near water, maybe you could turn the giant mound in the middle into a volcano? It would fit the setting pretty well.

good idea!

item.title: Custom Mining Area
item.dc:creator: @WarTusk-RSPS WarTusk-RSPS
item.description:
@WarTusk-RSPS wrote:

[quote=“hadlich4, post:7, topic:553040”][quote author=runescape sucks link=topic=671957.msg4493804#msg4493804 date=1440146305]

really doesn’t need to be that big

This.

Maybe if the rocks were something unique, or something worth going the distance for(similar to granite).
[/quote]

I see where yall are coming from I have to do a little more work on it of course but I know it’ll get be better this is just something I spent like 2 hours putting together last night wAnted to see if I’m heading in the right direction I’m gunna add more ores and for the way my finished server will be everything wI’ll be worthe the time I’m not gunna spoon feed my players like everyone else, my bitch’s gunna work for their coin haha[/quote]

It is a great start! Keep up the good work!

Read full topic

item.title: Custom Mining Area
item.dc:creator: @hadlich4 hadlich4
item.description:
@hadlich4 wrote:

Spades:

I’ve seen a few different things of yours and they are getting better. One suggestion with this one, add some more quality to the ground tiles (Meaning use like the rocks/gravel dirt tile. Maybe add different shades of dirt too. Otherwise it’s looking good.

True good idea I’ll have to attempt that thanks for the feedback I really appreciate it I should just make a main thread and do updates to it

Read full topic
